page.title: 09Recreation and Leisure.
page.content: A Branch of the{Women's Institute}was formed in 1921 and still flourishes It's aim is to work for the benefit and good of the village. A Branch of the{Cooperative Women's {Guild}meets weekly in the Village Hall Every week the{Senior Citizens}gather for social events and fellowship. The{Scout}and{Cub}Units are well attended, they take part in many exciting activities. This year they are building a new Scout Hut in their spare time. The{Guides}and{Brownies}meet weekly and have a varied, challenging programme. 1985 is the 75th Anniversary of the Guide Association and both units are celebrating. The{Junior Red Cross}is well attended, all the members try to keep their motto, "Serve one another".
